summary.span: 侦听文件系统更改通知，并在目录或目录中的文件发生更改时引发事件。

span.span: Listens to the file system change notifications and raises events when a directory, or file in a directory, changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于监视指定目录中的更改。Use to watch for changes in a specified directory. 可以监视指定目录的文件和子目录中的更改。You can watch for changes in files and subdirectories of the specified directory. 你可以创建一个组件来监视本地计算机、网络驱动器或远程计算机上的文件。You can create a component to watch files on a local computer, a network drive, or a remote computer. 若要监视所有文件中的更改, 请将属性设置为空字符串 ("") 或使用通配符 ("\*\*.")。To watch for changes in all files, set the property to an empty string ("") or use wildcards ("\*.\*"). 若要查看特定文件, 请将属性设置为文件名。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如, 若要监视文件 MyDoc 中的更改, 请将属性设置为 "MyDoc"。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 还可以监视特定类型的文件中的更改。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如, 若要监视文本文件中的更改, 请将属性设置为 "\*.txt"。For example, to watch for changes in text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 可以在目录或文件中监视几种类型的更改。There are several types of changes you can watch for in a directory or file. 例如, 你可以监视中`Attributes`的更改`LastWrite` 、日期`Size`和时间, 或者文件或目录的。For example, you can watch for changes in `Attributes`, the `LastWrite` date and time, or the `Size` of files or directories. 这是通过将属性设置为值之一来完成的。This is done by setting the property to one of the values. 有关可以观看的更改类型的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on the type of changes you can watch, see . 可以监视文件或目录的重命名、删除或创建。You can watch for renaming, deletion, or creation of files or directories. 例如, 若要监视是否重命名了文本文件, 请将属性设置为 "\* .txt" 并使用为其参数指定的指定方法。For example, to watch for renaming of text files, set the property to "\*.txt" and call the method with a specified for its parameter. Windows 操作系统会将文件更改的组件通知到由创建的缓冲区。The Windows operating system notifies your component of file changes in a buffer created by the . 如果短时间内有很多更改, 则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这会使组件失去对目录中的更改的跟踪, 并且它将只提供覆盖通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加缓冲区的大小会消耗大量资源, 因为它来自无法换出到磁盘的非分页内存, 因此, 请将缓冲区保持得足够小但足以避免丢失任何文件更改事件。Increasing the size of the buffer with the property is expensive, as it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small yet large enough to not miss any file change events. 若要避免缓冲区溢出, 请使用和属性, 以便可以筛选出不需要的更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties so you can filter out unwanted change notifications. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 使用类时, 请注意以下各项。Please note the following when using the class. - 不会忽略隐藏的文件。Hidden files are not ignored. - 在某些系统中 , 使用短8.3 文件名格式对文件进行了更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如, 将 "LongFileName" 更改为 "LongFil ~。Lon "。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFil~.Lon". - 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时,将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息, 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). - 可为通过网络监视目录的属性设置的最大大小为 64 KB。The maximum size you can set for the property for monitoring a directory over the network is 64 KB. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在 Windows 98 上运行。Running on Windows 98 is not supported. ## 复制和移动文件夹Copying and moving folders 操作系统和对象会将剪切和粘贴操作或移动操作解释为文件夹及其内容的重命名操作。The operating system and object interpret a cut-and-paste action or a move action as a rename action for a folder and its contents. 如果将包含文件的文件夹剪切并粘贴到被监视的文件夹中, 则对象只会将该文件夹报告为新文件夹, 但不会报告其内容, 因为它们实质上只是已重命名。If you cut and paste a folder with files into a folder being watched, the object reports only the folder as new, but not its contents because they are essentially only renamed. 若要通知文件夹内容已移动或复制到监视的文件夹, 请提供下表中所述的和事件处理程序方法。To be notified that the contents of folders have been moved or copied into a watched folder, provide and event handler methods as suggested in the following table. |事件处理程序Event Handler|处理的事件Events Handled|担任Performs| |-------------------|--------------------|--------------| ||, , , , |报告文件属性中的更改、创建的文件和删除的文件。Report changes in file attributes, created files, and deleted files.| |||列出重命名的文件和文件夹的新路径和新路径, 如果需要, 请进行递归扩展。List the old and new paths of renamed files and folders, expanding recursively if needed.| ## 事件和缓冲区大小Events and Buffer Sizes 请注意, 有几个因素可能会影响引发的文件系统更改事件, 如下所述:Note that several factors can affect which file system change events are raised, as described by the following: - 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如, 将文件从一个目录移到另一个目录时, 可能会引发多个和某些事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件是一项复杂的操作, 它包含多个简单操作, 因此引发了多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样, 某些应用程序 (例如, 防病毒软件) 可能会导致检测到其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . - 可以监视磁盘, 只要它们未被切换或删除。The can watch disks as long as they are not switched or removed. 不会为 cd 和 dvd 引发事件, 因为时间戳和属性无法更改。The does not raise events for CDs and DVDs, because time stamps and properties cannot change. 远程计算机必须安装其中一个所需的平台, 组件才能正常运行。Remote computers must have one of the required platforms installed for the component to function properly. - 如果在 windows XP Service Pack 1、windows 2000 SP2 或更早版本之前, 多个对象正在监视相同的 UNC 路径, 则只有其中一个对象会引发事件。If multiple objects are watching the same UNC path in Windows XP prior to Service Pack 1, or Windows 2000 SP2 or earlier, then only one of the objects will raise an event. 在运行 windows XP SP1 和更高版本、windows 2000 SP3 或更高版本或 windows Server 2003 的计算机上, 所有对象将引发相应的事件。On machines running Windows XP SP1 and newer, Windows 2000 SP3 or newer or Windows Server 2003, all objects will raise the appropriate events. 请注意, 当超过缓冲区大小时, 可能会错过某个事件。Note that a may miss an event when the buffer size is exceeded. 若要避免丢失事件, 请遵循以下准则:To avoid missing events, follow these guidelines: - 通过设置属性来增加缓冲区大小。Increase the buffer size by setting the property. - 避免监视包含长文件名的文件, 因为较长的文件名有助于填充缓冲区。Avoid watching files with long file names, because a long file name contributes to filling up the buffer. 请考虑使用较短的名称重命名这些文件。Consider renaming these files using shorter names. - 使事件处理代码尽可能简短。Keep your event handling code as short as possible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个来监视运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 组件设置为监视`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间中的更改、创建、删除或重命名目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改、创建或删除了某个文件, 则该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重命名文件后, 旧路径和新路径将打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能查看没有 Windows NT 或 Windows 2000 的远程计算机。You cannot watch a remote computer that does not have Windows NT or Windows 2000. 不能从 Windows NT 4.0 计算机上观看远程 Windows NT 4.0 计算机。You cannot watch a remote Windows NT 4.0 computer from a Windows NT 4.0 computer. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||、和的`LastWrite`按位`FileName`"或" 组合`DirectoryName`bitwise OR combination of `LastWrite`, `FileName`, and `DirectoryName`| ||`false`| ||"\*.\*"(监视所有文件。)"\*.\*" (Watch all files.)| ||`false`| ||81928192| ||空字符串 ("")empty string ("")| > [!NOTE] > 在设置后, 组件将不会监视指定的目录, 并且为`true`。The component will not watch the specified directory until the is set, and is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象, 用于监视运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a object to watch the directory specified at run time. 对象监视`LastWrite` 和`LastAccess`时间的更改, 以及用于创建、删除或重命名目录中的文本文件。 The object watches for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` times, and for the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改、创建或删除了某个文件, 则该文件的路径将显示在控制台中。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file displays to the console. 重命名文件后, 旧路径和新路径将显示在控制台中。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths display to the console. 此示例使用和命名空间。This example uses the and namespaces. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As FileSystemEventHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.IO.IODescription("Occurs when a file/directory change matches the filter")

summary.span: 当更改指定 中的文件和目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对受监视目录中的文件或目录的大小、系统属性、上次写入时间、上次访问时间或安全权限进行更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如, 将文件从一个目录移到另一个目录时, 可能会引发多个和某些事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件是一项复杂的操作, 它包含多个简单操作, 因此引发了多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样, 某些应用程序 (例如, 防病毒软件) 可能会导致检测到其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . 使用限制处理此事件时引发的通知数。Use to restrict the number of notifications raised when this event is handled. > [!NOTE] > 重命名文件时意外引发事件,但在重命名目录时不会引发事件。The event is raised unexpectedly when a file is renamed, but is not raised when a directory is renamed. 若要监视重命名, 请使用事件。To watch for renaming, use the event. > [!NOTE] > 当 属性 不`null`为时, 相对于其他事件引发事件的顺序可能会更改。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件在监视的文件发生更改时, 将文件路径显示到控制台。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is changed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Created As FileSystemEventHandler

summary.span: 当在指定 中创建文件和目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些常见的情况 (例如, 复制或移动文件或目录) 不与事件直接对应, 但这种情况确实会引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时, 系统将在文件被复制到的目录中引发事件 (如果正在监视该目录)。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果从中复制的目录被其他实例跟踪, 则不会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如, 您创建了的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视 "C:\My Documents", FileSystemWatcher2 设置为观看 "C:\Your Documents"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果将 "我的文档" 中的文件复制到 "你的文档" , 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件, 但不会为 FileSystemWatcher1 引发事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同, 移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events. 在上一示例中, 如果已将文件从 "我的文档" 移到 "你的文档 ", 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件 , 并且 FileSystemWatcher1 会引发一个事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如, 将文件从一个目录移到另一个目录时, 可能会引发多个和某些事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件是一项复杂的操作, 它包含多个简单操作, 因此引发了多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样, 某些应用程序 (例如, 防病毒软件) 可能会导致检测到其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . > [!NOTE] > 当 属性 不`null`为时, 相对于其他事件引发事件的顺序可能会更改。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. 一旦创建了文件, 就会引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果将文件复制或传输到受监视的目录, 将立即引发事件, 后跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件在每次创建受监视文件时显示控制台的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is created. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 删除指定 中的文件或目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些常见的情况 (例如, 复制或移动文件或目录) 不与事件直接对应, 但这种情况确实会引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时, 系统将在文件被复制到的目录中引发事件 (如果正在监视该目录)。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果从中复制的目录被其他实例跟踪, 则不会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如, 您创建了的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视 "C:\My Documents", FileSystemWatcher2 设置为观看 "C:\Your Documents"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果将 "我的文档" 中的文件复制到 "你的文档" , 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件, 但不会为 FileSystemWatcher1 引发事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同, 移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events. 在上一示例中, 如果已将文件从 "我的文档" 移到 "你的文档 ", 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件 , 并且 FileSystemWatcher1 会引发一个事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如, 将文件从一个目录移到另一个目录时, 可能会引发多个和某些事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件是一项复杂的操作, 它包含多个简单操作, 因此引发了多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样, 某些应用程序 (例如, 防病毒软件) 可能会导致检测到其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . > [!NOTE] > 当 属性 不`null`为时, 相对于其他事件引发事件的顺序可能会更改。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件在每次删除受监视文件时显示控制台的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is deleted. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非将设置为`true`, 否则组件将不会引发事件。The component will not raise events unless you set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 只有在设置了属性且 该属性为`true`之后, 组件才会监视指定的目录。The component will not watch the specified directory until the property has been set and is `true`. 方法允许调用事件处理程序以响应文件更改, 即使此属性设置为`false`也是如此。 The method allows event handlers to be invoked to respond to file changes even if this property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个来监视运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 组件设置为监视`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间中的更改、创建、删除或重命名目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改、创建或删除了某个文件, 则该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重命名文件后, 旧路径和新路径将打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. span.span: Occurs when the instance of is unable to continue monitoring changes or when the internal buffer overflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个事件阻止对象监视更改时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised whenever something prevents the object from monitoring changes. 例如, 如果对象正在监视远程目录中的更改, 并且与该目录的连接丢失, 则会引发事件。For example, if the object is monitoring changes in a remote directory and the connection to that directory is lost, the event is raised. 系统通知您文件发生了更改, 并将这些更改存储在组件创建并传递给 Api 的缓冲区中。The system notifies you of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer that the component creates and passes to the APIs. 如果短时间内有很多更改, 则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这会使组件失去对目录中的更改的跟踪, 并且它将只提供覆盖通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加缓冲区的大小会消耗大量资源, 因为它来自无法换出到磁盘的非分页内存, 因此使缓冲区尽可能小。Increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, because it comes from non paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免缓冲区溢出, 请使用、 和属性筛选出不需要的更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the , , and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如, 将文件从一个目录移到另一个目录时, 可能会引发多个和某些事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件是一项复杂的操作, 它包含多个简单操作, 因此引发了多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样, 某些应用程序 (例如, 防病毒软件) 可能会导致检测到其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要查看所有文件中的更改, 请将属性设置为空字符串 ("")。To watch changes in all files, set the property to an empty string (""). 若要查看特定文件, 请将属性设置为文件名。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如, 若要监视文件 MyDoc 中的更改, 请将属性设置为 "MyDoc"。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 还可以监视特定类型的文件中的更改。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如, 若要监视任何文本文件中的更改, 请将属性设置为 "\* .txt"。For example, to watch for changes in any text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 不支持使用多个筛选器\*, 例如|\*".txt"。Use of multiple filters such as "\*.txt|\*.doc" is not supported. 在 对象开始接收事件后, 可以更改该属性。The property can be changed after the object has started receiving events. 有关筛选出不需要的通知的详细信息, 请参阅、 和属性。For more information about filtering out unwanted notifications, see the , , and properties. 接受通配符以匹配文件, 如下面的示例中所示。 accepts wildcards for matching files, as shown in the following examples. |筛选器字符串Filter string|监视以下文件Watches the following files| |-------------------|---------------------------------| |\*.\*\*.\*|所有文件 (默认值)。All files (default). 空字符串 ("") 还会监视所有文件。An empty string ("") also watches all files.| |\*.txt\*.txt|扩展名为 "txt" 的所有文件。All files with a "txt" extension.| |\*recipe.doc\*recipe.doc|所有以 "食谱" 结尾且扩展名为 "doc" 的文件。All files ending in "recipe" with a "doc" extension.| |win\*.xmlwin\*.xml|所有以 "win" 开头且扩展名为 "xml" 的文件。All files beginning with "win" with an "xml" extension.| |销售额 \* 200？。xlsSales\*200?.xls|匹配以下内容:Matches the following:

-2001 年7月, .xls- Sales July 2001.xls
-2002 年8月, .xls- Sales Aug 2002.xls
-2004 年3月, .xls- Sales March 2004.xls

但不匹配:but does not match:

-1999 年11月的销售- Sales Nov 1999.xls| |MyReport.DocMyReport.Doc|仅监视 MyReportWatches only MyReport.doc| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个来监视运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 组件设置为监视`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间中的更改、创建、删除或重命名目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改、创建或删除了某个文件, 则该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重命名文件后, 旧路径和新路径将打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要`true`监视包含在通过属性指定的目录中的文件和目录的更改通知及其子目录, 则设置为。Set to `true` when you want to watch for change notifications for files and directories contained within the directory specified through the property, and its subdirectories. 将属性设置为`false`可帮助减少发送到内部缓冲区的通知数。 Setting the property to `false` helps reduce the number of notifications sent to the internal buffer. 有关筛选出不需要的通知的详细信息, 请参阅和属性。For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the and properties. 如果`true`为 , 则将递归整个子树, 而不只是直接子目录。When `true`, is recursive through the entire sub tree, not just the immediate child directories. 子树内的文件或目录的相对路径在的属性 中返回, 具体取决于所监视的更改。The relative path to a file or directory within the sub tree returns in the property of and the property of , depending on changes you are watching for. 你可以从的属性获取完全限定路径, 并从的属性获取, 具体取决于你所监视的更改。You can get the fully qualified path from the property of and the property of , depending on the changes you are watching for. 如果在要监视的目录的子树中创建了一个目录, 并且 `true`该目录将自动被监视。If a directory is created in the sub tree of the directory you are watching, and is `true`, that directory will automatically be watched.

summary.span: 获取或设置内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size (in bytes) of the internal buffer.

value.span: 内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The internal buffer size in bytes.
The default is 8192 (8 KB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将缓冲区设置为 4 KB 或更大, 但不能超过 64 KB。You can set the buffer to 4 KB or larger, but it must not exceed 64 KB. 如果尝试将该属性设置为小于4096个字节, 则将丢弃该值, 并将属性设置为4096个字节。If you try to set the property to less than 4096 bytes, your value is discarded and the property is set to 4096 bytes. 为了获得最佳性能, 请在基于 Intel 的计算机上使用 4 KB 的倍数。For best performance, use a multiple of 4 KB on Intel-based computers. 系统通知组件发生文件更改, 并将这些更改存储在组件创建并传递给 Api 的缓冲区中。The system notifies the component of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer the component creates and passes to the APIs. 每个事件最多可以使用16个字节的内存, 不包括文件名。Each event can use up to 16 bytes of memory, not including the file name. 如果短时间内有很多更改, 则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这会使组件失去对目录中的更改的跟踪, 并且它将只提供覆盖通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加缓冲区的大小可防止丢失文件系统更改事件。Increasing the size of the buffer can prevent missing file system change events. 不过, 增加缓冲区大小会消耗大量资源, 因为它来自无法换出到磁盘的非分页内存, 因此尽量使缓冲区尽可能小。However, increasing buffer size is expensive, because it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免缓冲区溢出, 请使用和属性来筛选出不需要的更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对受监视目录中的文件或目录的大小、系统属性、上次写入时间、上次访问时间或安全权限进行更改时, 将调用。 is called when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. 使用属性可限制处理事件时引发的事件数。 Use the property to restrict the number of events raised when the event is handled. 一旦创建了文件, 就会引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果将文件复制或传输到受监视的目录, 将立即引发事件, 后跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在受监视的目录中创建文件或目录时, 将调用。 is called when a file or directory is created in the directory being monitored. 一些常见的情况 (例如, 复制或移动文件或目录) 不与事件直接对应, 但这种情况确实会引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时, 系统将在文件被复制到的目录中引发事件 (如果正在监视该目录)。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果从中复制的目录被其他实例跟踪, 则不会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如, 您创建了的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视 "C:\My Documents", FileSystemWatcher2 设置为观看 "C:\Your Documents"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果从 "我的文档" 复制文件并将其粘贴到 "文档" 中, 将在 FileSystemWatcher2 中引发事件, 但不会为 FileSystemWatcher1 引发事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" and paste it into "Your Documents", a event will be raised in FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同, 移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 在上一示例中, 如果已将文件从 "我的文档" 移到 "你的文档 ", 则会在 FileSystemWatcher2 中引发事件, 并在 FileSystemWatcher1 中引发事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher1. 一旦创建了文件, 就会引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果将文件复制或传输到受监视的目录, 将立即引发事件, 后跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在被监视的目录中删除文件或目录时, 将调用。 is called when a file or directory, within the directory being monitored, is deleted. 一些常见的情况 (例如, 复制或移动文件或目录) 不与事件直接对应, 但这种情况确实会引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时, 系统将在文件被复制到的目录中引发事件 (如果正在监视该目录)。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果从中复制的目录被其他实例跟踪, 则不会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如, 您创建了的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视 "C:\My Documents", FileSystemWatcher2 设置为观看 "C:\Your Documents"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果将 "我的文档" 中的文件复制到 "你的文档" , 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件, 但不会为 FileSystemWatcher1 引发事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同, 移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 在上一示例中, 如果已将文件从 "我的文档" 移到 "你的文档 ", 则 FileSystemWatcher2 将引发一个事件 , 并且 FileSystemWatcher1 会引发一个事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在被监视的目录中的文件或目录被重命名时调用。 is called when a file or directory within the directory being monitored is renamed. 它的参数包含有关重命名操作的信息, 例如更改类型、旧路径和新路径以及旧名称和新名称。Its argument contains information about the renaming operation, such as the type of change, the old and new path, and the old and new name. 请注意, 如果重命名的事件不会从操作系统中获得匹配的旧名称和新名称事件, 则其属性可能为 null。Note that its property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置要监视的目录的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the directory to watch.
The path to monitor.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是目录的完全限定路径。This is a fully qualified path to a directory. 如果属性为`true`, 则此目录是系统监视更改的根目录; 否则, 它是唯一受监视的目录。 If the property is `true`, this directory is the root at which the system watches for changes; otherwise it is the only directory watched. 若要查看特定文件, 请将属性设置为完全限定的正确目录, 并将属性设置为文件名。To watch a specific file, set the property to the fully qualified, correct directory, and the property to the file name. 属性支持通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The property supports Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths. > [!NOTE] > 必须先设置此属性, 组件才能监视更改。This property must be set before the component can watch for changes. 重命名目录时, 会自动将自身重新附加到新重命名的项。When a directory is renamed, the automatically reattaches itself to the newly renamed item. 例如, 如果将属性设置为 "C:\My documents", 然后手动将目录重命名为 "C:\Your documents", 则组件将继续在新重命名的目录上侦听更改通知。For example, if you set the property to "C:\My Documents" and then manually rename the directory to "C:\Your Documents", the component continues listening for change notifications on the newly renamed directory. 但是, 当要求提供属性时, 它包含旧路径。However, when you ask for the property, it contains the old path. 出现这种情况的原因是, 组件根据句柄确定哪些目录监视, 而不是目录的名称。This happens because the component determines what directory watches based on the handle, rather than the name of the directory. 重命名不会影响句柄。Renaming does not affect the handle. 因此, 如果你销毁组件, 然后重新创建它而不更新属性, 则应用程序将失败, 因为该目录已不再存在。So, if you destroy the component, and then recreate it without updating the property, your application will fail because the directory no longer exists. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个来监视运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 组件设置为监视`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间中的更改、创建、删除或重命名目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改、创建或删除了某个文件, 则该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重命名文件后, 旧路径和新路径将打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 重命名指定 中的文件或目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is renamed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是具有以下签名的委托: `Renamed`The `Renamed` event is an delegate that has the following signature: ```csharp public delegate void Renamed(object sender, RenamedEventArgs e); ``` ```vb Public Delegate Sub RenamedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RenamedEventArgs) ``` 对象提供有关重命名操作的信息, 如重命名的类型 (属性)、旧名称和新名称, 以及新旧路径。 The object provides information about the renaming operation, such as the type of the rename (the property), the old and new name, and the old and new path. 请注意, 如果重命名的事件不会从操作系统中获得匹配的旧名称和新名称事件, 则该属性可能为 null。Note that the property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 重命名所监视的目录不会引发通知。Renaming the directory you are watching will not raise a notification. 只会为你所监视的目录内的条目引发通知。Notifications are only raised for entries inside the directory you are watching. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件在每次重命名监视的文件时显示控制台的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is renamed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为时,处理、 、和事件的方法将在系统线程池中的线程上调用。 `null`When is `null`, methods handling the , , , and events are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 有关系统线程池的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on system thread pools, see . 当 、、和事件由 visual Windows 窗体组件 (如) 处理时, 通过系统线程池访问组件可能不起作用, 或可能会导致异常。When the , , , and events are handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a , accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or may result in an exception. 通过将设置为 Windows 窗体组件来避免这种情况, 这会导致 处理、 、 和事件的方法在创建该组件的同一线程上调用。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods that handle the , , , and events to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果在 Windows 窗体设计器[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]内使用, 则会自动将设置为包含的控件。 If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, automatically sets to the control that contains the . 例如, 如果将设置为 form1 的设计器 (继承自) , 则将的属性设置为 form1 的实例。For example, if you place a on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of Form1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会无限期地等待, 直到第一次更改发生, 然后返回。This method waits indefinitely until the first change occurs and then returns. 这与在`timeout`参数设置为 -1 时使用的相同。This is the same as using with the `timeout` parameter set to -1. > [!NOTE] > 此方法允许调用事件处理程序以响应文件更改, 即使属性设置为`false`也是如此。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系统中 , 使用短8.3 文件名格式对文件进行了更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如, 将 "LongFileName" 更改为 "LongFi ~。Lon "。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一直等待, 直到发生更改或已超时。对于`timeout`参数, 值为-1 表示无限期等待。This method waits until a change occurs or it has timed out. A value of -1 for the `timeout` parameter means wait indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 此方法允许调用事件处理程序以响应文件更改, 即使属性设置为`false`也是如此。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系统中 , 使用短8.3 文件名格式对文件进行了更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如, 将 "LongFileName" 更改为 "LongFi ~。Lon "。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".
